metadata.synopsis: AD of one of the werewolves in the ballroom in Cazador's PalaceThis AD is played at different positions of the Ballroom which he is patrolling

1.speaker: Gheris Hhune
1.text: No mumbling! No talk to rats! They only lie.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Werewolf looking at his brother who is talking to a bunch of rats in a crazy stupor

2.speaker: Gheris Hhune
2.text: Wolves will not obey? Be their alpha. Make them hear you.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Werewolf looking at this brother werewolf who is asserting dominance over some dire wolves

3.speaker: Gheris Hhune
3.text: New master keeps all the fresh meat. But not for long. Tonight he changes.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Werewolf looking at an empty throne and imagining Cazador sitting there after the ritual.

0.speaker: Gheris Hhune
0.text: Promises we'll have fresh meat then. All we can eat, bloody and raw.
